issue.title: checko.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://checko.ru/company/bilayn-servis-1026301170708](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchecko.ru%2Fcompany%2Fbilayn-servis-1026301170708) ### Comment > Не работает блокировщик. На сайтах присутствует реклама, всплывающие окна, баннеры. Это происходит уже несколько дней. На одном из скриншотов видно, что блокировщик не обновляется и это тоже происходит уже не один день, фильтры не обвновляются, выпадает ошибка, и блокировщик ничего не фильтрует. И еще просьба «пнуть» службу поддержки VPN. Они просто игнорируют уже не один месяц! Так себе сервис для людей, которые покупают годовые подписки.. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2owp5yhaue04wgw0gw0g40c8wggggw0e2e3t1cd0i0.png?nc=1)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

> [!NOTE]

> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION]

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://audee-membership.jp/zigzag-mikoto/articles/news/ar6NdJ9oZEXbsjJ2ZCia2AAG](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faudee-membership.jp%2Fzigzag-mikoto%2Farticles%2Fnews%2Far6NdJ9oZEXbsjJ2ZCia2AAG) ### Comment > There are multiple websites with the same or very similar design as this one. > Since those websites likely have the same issues, I will list them below. > > ``` > https://ahnbohyun-fc.com/articles/blog/ar6gwTo2YVGDbFTMSQEL3Jxr > https://banbanzai-fc.com/articles/uragawa/arDtAFZXuquPonP7XGrZVkxP > https://gs-ch.com/articles/contents/arAvkZfYVM6824kvo9fvderr > https://hyakuta.com/articles/news/ar32bUeiFCZ22YhQKaFiSdcU > https://kamiofuju.com/articles/news/ar4BF8hqCTtbhP2RG89km2Yn > https://kawahara-no.jp/articles/news/arP4pwbrZnPmLnjwX5vNzkXJ > https://ldh-live-square.com/articles/news/arjXXbnd6Sby6kju9W3L7scV > https://malice-kibana.com/articles/photo/arjdtMwHZHvLdeiprqjNPPdZ > https://maziyabacity.com/articles/blog/arRVXFYNjtpThbdh4JG3Y9Ng > https://pizzaradio.jp/articles/news/arTmwaHFeF3jdLyZtZ6dcecW > https://rabbitxparty.com/articles/news/arJwjJcKpv4oXBQNUaXpJy3X > https://rehacq-mattari.com/articles/note/argiGDbMuTpuTXHxd4AC6Ey3 > https://sae-okazaki.com/articles/gallery/arn2wJTq82YctVMb66kcoaVy > https://salon-de-horizon.jp/articles/info/araeiQBitQMCxGz6B3sZb7Lm > https://sinjirarenai.com/articles/sinmaga_rensai/arA4E8bo3SYtezsHS4WUmt3p > https://suzuka-ouji-officialfc.com/articles/blog/arRtvLiP3C2cbXS3osjtYh8w > https://sweetpowerfc.com/articles/news/arENpwbPVWPdNihowXRCjgLN > https://tenshi-nano.com/articles/photo/arES4anw8UfeJNhuGsYDyoss > https://uise-official.com/articles/info/arqggwbka9duneSfvymmaTK > ``` ### Screenshots
